General.Name: Decora SA
General.Description: Decora S.A., together with its subsidiaries, engages in the production, distribution, sale, and export of interior finishing and decoration products in Poland. The company offers polyurethane-mineral, XPS, and PEHD floor underlays; polymer skirting boards, including white skirting boards, and skirting boards in wood colors; and floor profiles in various shapes, as well as provides ODM and OEM services. It is also involved in the wholesale of building materials and sanitary equipment; and rental and lease of production machines, as well as real estate properties. The company markets its products under the Arbiton, Afirmax, Vidella, and Ewifoam brands. Decora S.A. was founded in 1994 and is based in Sroda Wielkopolska, Poland.
General.Address: ul. Ignacego Pradzynskiego 24 a, Sroda Wielkopolska, Poland, 63-000
